Title: SilverBullet
Description: SilverBullet is an open-source implementation of Microsoft's XNA Framework, written on top of SilverLight.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

SilverBullet is an open-source implementation of Microsoft's XNA Framework, built on top of Microsoft SilverLight to enable simple XNA games to be run within a webbrowser. SilverBullet is designed as a drop-in replacement, meaning that adding a reference to SilverBullet is all that is needed to 'port' an XNA game to SilverLight. See the Documentation page for more information.
